Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 93rd/Colfax
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony and 93rd: due to, street blockage near 93rd/Colfax.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 93rd, Colfax, 92nd, Anthony, 93rd and over regular route , due to street blockage near 93rd/Colfax.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th and #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 95 95th and 30 South Chicago buses temporarily rerouted due to, street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

#95 95th and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 92nd/Exchange, due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

#95 95th buses will operate via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd and over regular route .

#30 South Chicago buses will operate via South Chicago, 91st, Commercial, 92nd and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Belmont. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
